001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.util;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
005import org.reactivestreams.Processor;
006import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
007import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
008
009import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
010import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
011import java.io.IOException;
012
013/**
014 * Processor that converts items from one type to another using specified MessageWriter/MessageReader.
015 *
016 * @param <P>
017 * @param <S>
018 */
019public class TypeConverterProcessor<P, S>
020        implements Processor<P, S> {
021    private final MessageWriter<P> writer;
022    private final MessageReader<S> reader;
023    private Subscriber<? super S> subscriber;
024    private Subscription subscription;
025
026    public TypeConverterProcessor(MessageWriter<P> writer, MessageReader<S> reader) {
027        this.writer = writer;
028        this.reader = reader;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super S> subscriber) {
033        this.subscriber = subscriber;
034        if (subscription != null)
035            subscriber.onSubscribe(subscription);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
040        this.subscription = subscription;
041        if (subscriber != null)
042            subscriber.onSubscribe(subscription);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public void onNext(P item) {
047
048        // Convert item to correct type
049        try {
050            ByteArrayOutputStream bout = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
051            writer.writeTo(item, bout);
052            ByteArrayInputStream bin = new ByteArrayInputStream(bout.toByteArray());
053            S newItem = reader.readFrom(bin);
054            subscriber.onNext(newItem);
055        } catch (IOException e) {
056            subscriber.onError(e);
057            subscription.cancel();
058        }
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public void onError(Throwable throwable) {
063        subscriber.onError(throwable);
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void onComplete() {
068        subscriber.onComplete();
069    }
070}
